merpi_desc: %USER's nose. It might be wet or dry, but either way it's a sniffer for snoofing.

merpi_normal: %USER is trying to breath the life out of %TARGET through their %T_PART!!
merpi_flowery: %USER takes a deep breath of %TARGET's %T_PART like they're trying to snort cocaine off of it!!
%USER sniffs softly, inhaling the scent of %TARGET's %T_PART without really meaning to.
%USER immediatly notices the smell of %TARGET's %T_PART and can't stop themselves from taking in a deep whiff!

merpi_normal: %USER inhales as much of %TARGET's %T_PART as they can, shuddering from the pleasure of it!
merpi_flowery: %USER inhales as much of %TARGET's %T_PART as they can, shuddering from the pleasure of it!

merpi_normal: %USER practically buries their nose against %TARGET's %T_PART, reveling in the scent!
merpi_flowery: %USER practically buries their nose against %TARGET's %T_PART, reveling in the scent!

merpi_normal: %USER slightly opens their mouth, and scrunges from the sheer excitement of the smell!
merpi_flowery: %USER slightly opens their mouth, and scrunges from the sheer excitement of the smell!
